div.p: I have a background in retail and I always was very successful with customer services, I really like talking to people and am very chatty
so when I got offered the chance to do front of house it felt quite natural to me because most of my interaction is talking to customers.
We get ratings on websites and I most enjoy seeing if I’ve put a lot of effort in you’ll get a review written up and if we get mentioned
that is my most favourite thing because it shows all that work you've put in that day has been successful and it’s hard work but you get that review
and it makes you feel great and that is my favourite thing checking the reviews every night.
